blueprint.name: Simplified Adaptive Lighting
blueprint.description: This blueprint adjusts the brightness and white temperature of connected lights based on the sun position.
input.target_lights.name: Lights to control
input.target_lights.description: Choose one or more light(s) to control with this automation.
input.adaptive_settings.name: Settings
input.brightness_night.name: Minimum brightness
input.brightness_night.description: Minimum brightness at the beginning and end of the day.
input.brightness_day.name: Maximum brightness
input.brightness_day.description: Maximum brightness in the middle of the day.
input.kelvin_night.name: Minimum temperature
input.kelvin_night.description: White temperature at the beginning and end of the day (in Kelvin).
input.kelvin_day.name: Maximum temperature
input.kelvin_day.description: White temperature in the middle of the day (in Kelvin).
input.auto_mode_section.name: Optional automation control
input.enable_auto_mode.name: Manual control
input.enable_auto_mode.description: By checking this box, an input_boolean or binary_sensor entity can be used to block automatic light changes.
input.auto_mode_boolean.name: Control entity
input.auto_mode_boolean.description: Select an input_boolean or binary_sensor entity to control the automation. When it is inactive, lights will no longer adapt throughout the day.
input.weather_variability_section.name: Weather variability
input.enable_weather_variability.name: Enable weather variability
input.enable_weather_variability.descrip: Applies slight curve and temperature changes based on weather. The daily forecast is only requested when a light turns on.
input.weather_entity.name: Weather entity
input.weather_entity.description: Select the weather entity used to adjust settings.
